subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kershaw, the Dodgers’ ace, had a perfect game going through six innings and struck out 11 batters while sending the Mets to their 11th shutout loss of the season.
snippet: Kershaw, the Dodgers’ ace, had a perfect game going through six innings and struck out 11 batters while sending the Mets to their 11th shutout loss of the season.
